original_text: For the power of the horses is in their mouths and in their tails, for their tails are like serpents with heads, and by means of them they wound.
korean_text: 이 말들의 힘은 입과 꼬리에 있으니 꼬리는 뱀 같고 또 꼬리에 머리가 있어 이것으로 해하더라

sentences.original_text: For the power of the horses is in their mouths and in their tails
sentences.korean_translation: 말들의 힘은 그들의 입과 꼬리에 있다.

sentences.original_text: for their tails are like serpents with heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 꼬리는 머리가 달린 뱀과 같다.

sentences.original_text: and by means of them they wound.
